restaurant.name: RetroBite Diner
restaurant.slogan: Where you come for the BEST food anywhere!

food.name: Original Belgian Waffles
food.description: Two of our famous Belgian Waffles with plenty of real maple syrup

food.name: French Toast
food.description: Thick slices made from our homemade sourdough bread

food.name: Mile-High Pancakes
food.description: Pancakes stacked as high as you like with our real maple syrup

food.name: Homestyle Breakfast
food.description: Two eggs, bacon or sausage, toast, and our ever-popular hash browns

food.name: Grilled Cheese
food.description: Our best cheese on either wheat or white bread

food.name: BLT
food.description: Bacon, lettuce and tomato on sourdough bread

food.name: Chef Salad
food.description: All the fixings with your choice of dressing

food.name: Grilled Salmon
food.description: Freshly caught Salmon grilled to perfection

food.name: Chicken Pasta
food.description: Grilled chicken in pasta with basil sauce

food.name: Baby-back Ribs
food.description: Ribs coated with our special BBQ sauce
